comment: I was never banned from Twitter or Facebook. I had voluntarily deleted my accounts as a protest in support of Free Speech. But after today's events and the blame being placed on the Gab community, I created a new Twitter account with my old Twitter handle thinking I wanted to go defend our community. So I followed a few of my favs and read my timeline. It made me sick what people are saying about us. I don't even know where to start.
amr:
# ::snt I was never banned from Twitter or Facebook. I had voluntarily deleted my accounts as a protest in support of Free Speech. But after today's events and the blame being placed on the Gab community, I created a new Twitter account with my old Twitter handle thinking I wanted to go defend our community. So I followed a few of my favs and read my timeline. It made me sick what people are saying about us. I don't even know where to start.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / ban-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (p / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Twitter"))
                  :op2 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Facebook")))
            :ARG2 (ii / i)
            :time (e / ever))
      :snt2 (d / delete-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (a / account
                  :poss ii2)
            :ARG1-of (v / volunteer-01
                  :ARG0 ii2)
            :purpose (p3 / protest-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (s / support-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (s2 / speak-01
                              :ARG3-of (f / free-04)))))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (c2 / create-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (a2 / account
                        :ARG1-of (n3 / new-01)
                        :medium (p4 / publication
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Twitter")))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (t / think-01
                              :ARG0 ii3
                              :ARG1 (w / want-01
                                    :ARG0 ii3
                                    :ARG1 (g / go-03
                                          :ARG0 ii3
                                          :ARG1 (d2 / defend-01
                                                :ARG0 ii3
                                                :ARG1 (c4 / community
                                                      :poss (w2 / we)))))))
                  :time (a3 / after
                        :op1 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (f2 / follow-02
                                    :ARG0 ii3
                                    :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (ii4 / include-91
                                                :ARG2 (p6 / person
                                                      :ARG1-of (f3 / favor-01
                                                            :ARG0 ii3))
                                                :quant (f4 / few)))
                                    :op2 (r / read-01
                                          :ARG0 ii3
                                          :ARG1 (t2 / timeline
                                                :poss ii3)))))
                  :snt4 (m2 / make-02
                        :ARG0 (a5 / and
                              :op1 f2
                              :ARG0 ii3
                              :ARG1 t2
                              :poss ii3))
                  :op2 (k / know-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 ii3
                        :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / start-01))
                        :mod (e2 / even)))))

comment: Use of the r-word is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults people with mental disabilities.
amr:
# ::snt Use of the r-word is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults people with mental disabilities.
(p / possible-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (a / accept-01
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (s / string-entity
                              :value "r-word")))
            :location (d / discourse-01
                  :ARG0 (w2 / we)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / demean-01
                        :ARG0 u
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (d3 / disability
                                          :mod (m / mind)))))
                  :op2 (ii / insult-01
                        :ARG0 u
                        :ARG1 p2))))

comment: There are better words that should be used to replace the foul language.
amr:

(r / recommend-01
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (g / good-02
                              :ARG1 w)
                        :ARG3 (m / more)))
            :ARG2 (r2 / replace-01
                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :mod (f / foul)))))

comment: The R word is highly offensive.  Spread the word to end the word!
amr:
# ::snt The R word is highly offensive.  Spread the word to end the word!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "R"))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (s2 / spread-03
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w2 / word)
            :purpose (e / end-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 w2)))
